examples.example: 出门在外，一定要小心照顾好自己。

translate.english: Be careful and take good care of yourself when going out.

examples.example: 过路口时要小心看信号灯，注意安全。

translate.english: Be careful to look at the signal lights when crossing the intersection and pay attention to safety.

examples.example: 我小心地捧着珍贵的礼物，满心欢喜地向朋友走去。

translate.english: I carefully held the precious gift and walked towards my friend happily.
